title: Imm Tricks
description: Book 2 of the Young Adult Paranormal Romance Series; The Presenting Saga. Kaylee knew that living with Immortals meant becoming part of a secret world. What she didnâ€™t expect was that the heaviest secrets she carried would be her own. An unwanted gift, an unwelcome visitor, and an argument overheard in the woods were just the beginning. The dangers around her were increasing, but with Will acting so strangely, who could she tell?
author: Diana Petkovic
